A reply to Mr. Edwards's brief reflections on A short discourse of the true knowledge of Christ Jesus, &c. to which is prefixed a preface wherein something is said concerning reason and antiquity in the chief controversies with the Socinians / by S. Bold ... Bold, S. (Samuel), 1649-1737. Bold, S. (Samuel), 1649-1737. Short discourse of the true knowledge of Christ Jesus.
xvi, 52 p.
Printed for A. and J. Churchill ..., London : 1697.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
